actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution that the bill entitled "A bill for the relief of Leo Lucas" be referred to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers the bill entitled "A bill for the relief of Leo Lucas," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution that the bill entitled "A bill for the relief of Leo Lucas" be referred to the Chief Commissioner of the U.S. Court of Claims for a report thereon.
